document.query: INSERT INTO `provider_setting` (`name`,`value`,`type`,`provider_id`,`created_at`,`updated_at`) VALUES ('markdownPercentage', '10', '', (SELECT id FROM `provider` WHERE company='Xanpool'),NOW(),NOW());
